data.name: Flow - Open up for positive energy
data.detailed_description:
This DLC gives you access to the Open up for positive energy meditation.
Moving your body, while opening your mind and heart creates more access to positive energy.
data.about_the_game:
This DLC gives you access to the Open up for positive energy meditation.
Moving your body, while opening your mind and heart creates more access to positive energy.
data.short_description: This DLC gives you access to the Open up for positive energy meditation. Moving your body, while opening your mind and heart creates more access to positive energy.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200, FX4350 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050Ti / Radeon RX 470 or greater
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
